Tag 2 is a thrilling and fast-paced version of the classic game of tag available as a Chrome Extension and can also be played for free on the website https://unblockedgames6x.org/. The game features an engaging Zombie mode, where players must work together to survive. Additionally, there are numerous Runners to unlock and daily quests to complete, ensuring that there is always something new to discover.
